name: Sube Sube no Mi
description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that makes the user's body perfectly smooth and slippery. Anything that touches the user's skin will slip off, including attacks. As a side effect, all of the user's excess body fat 'slips off,' granting them a much slimmer and more attractive appearance.

abilities.name: Smooth Body
abilities.description: The user's body becomes perfectly smooth, causing attacks and objects to slip off harmlessly.

abilities.name: Beauty Transformation
abilities.description: All excess body fat slips off the user, transforming their physical appearance.

keyMoments.description: Alvida explains to Luffy how the Sube Sube no Mi transformed her body and gave her its powers.

weaknesses.description: Like all Devil Fruit users, contact with Seastone neutralizes the user's powers.
Standard Devil Fruit weakness to sea water.

name: Moku Moku no Mi
description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into smoke at will. As a Logia, it grants intangibility, making the user nearly invulnerable to physical attacks.

abilities.name: Smoke Intangibility
abilities.description: The user can turn their body into smoke, allowing attacks to pass through them harmlessly.

abilities.name: Smoke Creation and Control
abilities.description: The user can create and manipulate smoke for various purposes, including capturing opponents.

keyMoments.description: Smoker uses his Smoke-Smoke Fruit powers to pursue and attempt to capture Luffy.

weaknesses.description: Smoke can be dispersed by powerful wind, as demonstrated when Dragon's wind stopped Smoker.
